fields.label: Heading
fields.value: Speak Egyptian Arabic Like a Local

fields.label: Body
fields.value: Knowing Egyptian Arabic makes life in Cairo navigable and more fun! I (Yousef) offer one-on-one lessons to foreigners that equip them to read and speak Egyptian Arabic confidently and grasp the local lifestyle and culture.

final.html:
Speak Egyptian Arabic Like a Local

Knowing Egyptian Arabic makes life in Cairo navigable and more fun! I (Yousef) offer one-on-one lessons to foreigners that equip them to read and speak Egyptian Arabic confidently and grasp the local lifestyle and culture.

Message Yousef

value.html:
Learning Arabic is essential for navigating the chaos of Cairo

But there’s a problem. Most Egyptian Arabic classes:

  • don’t connect to your everyday life and activities

  • use a rigid one-size-fits-all curriculum

  • use boring and outdated techniques

  • don’t produce substantial results

You deserve better quality and worthwhile classes. Taking my tailored one-on-one Arabic lessons will quickly help you to start communicating and thriving in your everyday life in Egypt

raw.html:
{{heading}}

{{{body}}}
raw.js:
import AOS from 'aos' 
AOS.init({ once: true })

fields.label: Body
fields.value:
I use teaching methods that help you learn the language in an effective and interactive way. Some of the techniques include:

  • both in-class and out-of-class activities based on your daily activities and interests in Cairo
  • drilling techniques, visual tools, and relevant examples that will ensure you retain the language
  • cultural lessons on the unspoken rules and customs that will improve your interpersonal relations with locals

final.html:
Effective Learning in Context

I use teaching methods that help you learn the language in an effective and interactive way. Some of the techniques include:

  • both in-class and out-of-class activities based on your daily activities and interests in Cairo
  • drilling techniques, visual tools, and relevant examples that will ensure you retain the language
  • cultural lessons on the unspoken rules and customs that will improve your interpersonal relations with locals

final.html: Hear from my students

value.html: Since getting certified to teach Arabic as a second language, I have taught over 180 students in the Egyptian Arabic language, both in professional learning centres and privately. After teaching a number of diplomats, university students, business owners, and international school teachers I have learned how to effectively customize lessons for each student’s learning needs and goals.
